title: CRISPY COD WITH LEMON-DILL SAUCE
directions: in a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, yogurt, pickle, lemon juice, and dill; chill in fridge until ready to serve.

place egg in a shallow dish. combine panko, paprika, onion powder, and garlic powder in a second shallow dish. sprinkle fish evenly with pepper and salt. dip each fillet in egg white, then dredge in panko mixture; place on a parchment-lined baking sheet. broil 4 minutes on each side or until desired degree of doneness.
serve fish with a nice dollop of lemon-dill sauce and lemon wedges.
ingredients: 2 tbsp finely chopped dill pickle (or dill pickle relish)
½ tsp dried dill (or 1 tsp fresh dill)
